name: places/ChIJT_J6jYNZwokRMgHsXJrajNY
formattedAddress: 181 E Houston St #4e, New York, NY 10002, USA
adrFormatAddress: 181 E Houston St #4e, New York, NY 10002, USA

originalText.text: I have been using dimov tax for many years for both personal & business taxes. They have been with me through multiple job changes, career changes, business ventures, partnerships, etc. and have been excellent each year. My significant other also has been using them for years and we are happy to recommend them to others. They are quick to reply to messages and thorough with their work. My recommendation is to reach out for tax planning early in the year to get a tax plan set up that way you know exactly what you are doing by the time the tax season starts. Dimov asked us to do this our first year & that was different from any prior accountant. It was a huge help because we discovered things we did not know about and really helped us get set up to not miss any deductions. It also helped us with general organization because prior years tax season was chaos for us, especially when I had the business. In any case, I hope this helps & I am am glad to write a review for them.

originalText.text: George & his team, specifically Jurgen Harka, have been filing my taxes for 8 years now. They were my accountant while I moved from Fort Lauderdale to Portland, OR, to Austin, TX, back to Portland, then to Boston, then to Philly. They are absolutely fantastic and I even came to visit their office in New York years ago pre-covid when things used to exist in the physical realm. Now we are digital, and all the better! George has been excellent to work with and super supportive of my business ventures, even having visited my restaurant a couple times over the years. I will continue to use them. They complete my personal and small business taxes & also work on the tax & accounting for several of my friends. Super appreciate the assistance and responsiveness.

originalText.text: The Dimov team did an excellent job with my tax filing. I had a special request for my tax filing as mark-to-market accounting status, and the team worked diligently have this done correctly. I also had rental income in a different state, as well as no copy of the prior year's return. The team worked around all of these nuances, and filed my taxes just in time. The group is very professional with excellent communication as well. Will be back for the years to come.

originalText.text: I have been using this firm for the last two years. They have been excellent with helping me not overpay on my self-employment taxes. My bookkeeper has been Maksim and he has been excellent to work with the whole time. The other members on George team have had excellent responsiveness as well. I certainly appreciate the tax advice and have also recommended one of my other friends to use them as well. She is also a contractor/freelancer and has had a great experience. They set me up on quickbooks and file my taxes ahead of time each year. It is Jan 30th and i’m already finished! What a relief. I will continue to use them for sure.

originalText.text:
Would not recommend. They have so many great reviews but my experience with them was horrible. I got tossed around to several different people at his firm, caught their mistakes for them, and almost got the wrong tax return because they didn't know what they were doing. Honestly, a horrible experience and would not recommend for the average person.

For extra context, not only was it clear through my emails that I was frustrated, I clearly stated in one my last emails that the entire process was confusing because of what I described above. This was never addressed. While I could go through every email and breakdown each sentence to counter the owner's response, I won't. He and his staff should have provided good customer service when it was clear that wasn't happening. Outside of his attempt to call me which I did ignore (he only cared once I posted a review), George Dimov is twisting the truth to his benefit and should be ashamed for treating customers like this/handling people's money in this way. Horrible.
